lyrics.text:
‘E Sīsū, na’a Ke tuku atu,
Mo kouna ho’ kau faifekau,
Ke fai he potu fulipē
‘A e Misinale laumālie.

“Mou ‘alu pē ki tua’ā,
Tuʻu ‘i he hala pule’anga,
Foli he vao kehekehe,
Puke ‘a e laumālie hē.”

Na’a Ke mamahi ke vakai
‘A e hē mama’o ni toko lahi;
‘O ‘alu fiekaia pē
He hala fakatau ki mate.

‘Oku nau kei tokoto na
Hangē ni sipi tuku noa;
‘Ikai ha taha ke tauhia
‘A e vaivai mo mahaki’ia.

Ko si’i fa’ahinga pani hia,
Mousa’a mo fakalielia,
Fakapo’uli honau loto
He kuihi ‘e he Tēvolo.

‘E Sīsū, ‘omi ke mau ‘ofa
Si’i fanga sipi mate noa:
Toe fai mai ho’ angi ē,
“Mou misinale laumālie.”
